name: Fantasy Quest
description:
Fantasy Quest is loosely based on the 1985 game "Battle City" for NES. After 3 months of pulling my hair out of my head, hundreds of cans of cola and thousands of lines beginner's tangled C#, I finally managed to get the game in playable state.

Every piece of art was created by me. Music tracks are licenced tracks from Playonloop.com.

CONTROLS: WASD-keys move, SPACEBAR shoots.
